full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE DRUNG BLA MA TSE 'PHEL RDO RJE DPAL BZANG PO LA GSOL BA 'DEBS DANG SHING ZHABS PAD BRTAN PA'I SMON TSIG NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES THUB PA'I GDUNG 'TSEB GNAS BRTAN 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA CHEN PO, SRID ZHI'I MTHA' LAS YONGS SU 'DZIN PA'I STON PA CHEN PO, ZAB GSANG RDO RJE'I RNAL 'BYOR LA GZHOL BA'I RNAL 'BYOR PA CHEN PO, RJE DRUNG BLA MA TSE 'PHEL RDO RJE DPAL BZANG PO LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, SHING ZHABS PAD BRTAN PA'I SMON TSIG 'DI NI, GANG GI SLOB BU'I THA SHAL BTZUN GZUGS RATNA BADZRA DANG GUS CHEN POS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS TE PHUL BSAM DON LHUN GYIS 'GRUB PAR GYUR CIG ,)
